text: Kogda zhe po Nashemu poveleniyu prishla k Sulaymanu smert', to dzhinny ne dogadalis' o ney, i lish' zemnoy cherv' ukazal na yego smert', pod"yev posokh, na kotoryy on opiralsya, i on upal. A kogda on upal, lish' togda urazumeli dzhinny, chto yesli by oni znali taynoye, to ne ostalis' by v unizitel'nom i tyazholom dlya nikh nakazanii - trude
